oracle.mapviewer.share.style
Class AreaStyleModel

java.lang.Object
  oracle.mapviewer.share.style.AbstractStyleModel
      oracle.mapviewer.share.style.AreaStyleModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, StyleModel
public class AreaStyleModel
extends AbstractStyleModel

Represents the data model for a MapViewer AREA style.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
static int AREA_STYLE_COLOR
          Contstants representing possible fill types: AREA_STYLE_COLOR indicates pattern is filled using solid color.
static int AREA_STYLE_GRADIENT_COLOR
          Contstants representing possible fill types: AREA_STYLE_GRADIENT_COLOR indicates pattern is filled using a color gradient.
static int AREA_STYLE_TEXTURE
          Contstants representing possible fill types: AREA_STYLE_TEXTURE indicates pattern is filled using a texture pattern image.

Field Detail

AREA_STYLE_COLOR

public static final int AREA_STYLE_COLOR
Contstants representing possible fill types: AREA_STYLE_COLOR indicates pattern is filled using solid color.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

AREA_STYLE_TEXTURE

public static final int AREA_STYLE_TEXTURE
Contstants representing possible fill types: AREA_STYLE_TEXTURE indicates pattern is filled using a texture pattern image.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

AREA_STYLE_GRADIENT_COLOR

public static final int AREA_STYLE_GRADIENT_COLOR
Contstants representing possible fill types: AREA_STYLE_GRADIENT_COLOR indicates pattern is filled using a color gradient. This fill type is currently not supported.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

public java.lang.String getTypeName()

toXMLString

public java.lang.String toXMLString()
This method, when implemented by an extended class, creates a string that contains the XML representation of this style bean. This XML document can then be saved to the DEFINITION column of the USER_SDO_STYLES table.

Returns:
String - an XML string containing the definition of this style

setAreaStyleType

public void setAreaStyleType(int t)
Sets the area style fill pattern type. Available types are: AREA_STYLE_COLOR, AREA_STYLE_TEXTURE, AREA_STYLE_GRADIENT_COLOR (not supported)

Parameters:
t - - fill pattern type

int - fill pattern type code

setBorderStyleName

public void setBorderStyleName(java.lang.String borderStyleName)
Sets the style name (usually a line style) to be used when rendering the area style border. If this parameter is null, the border color and width parameters are used to render the area style border.

Parameters:
borderStyleName - - border style name

getBorderStyleName

public java.lang.String getBorderStyleName()
Returns the style name (usually a line style) that is used to render the area style border.

Returns:
String - border style name

Parameters:

public byte[] getFillPatternImage()
